classes.title: CHER101
classes.subtitle: Elementary Cherokee Language I.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Provides an introduction to speaking, listening, reading, and writing in the Cherokee language. This course is part of an ongoing effort to revitalize Cherokee--an endangered language indigenous to North Carolina. Students will acquire basic conversational Cherokee and learn to read and write the Sequoyah syllabary.Gen Ed: FL.Grading status: Letter grade.
